articles.description: Crash Bandicoot 4: It's About Time is the long-awaited sequel to the original trilogy, picking up where Warped left off.
articles.content: Crash Bandicoot has been missing in action for years at this point, with remastered versions of his past adventures and racing spin-offs keeping fans occupied. However, the time to wait is almost up,… [+1659 chars]

articles.author: Tom Harrison
articles.title: Your iPhone is about to become a car key - Top Gear
articles.description: BMW is the first to use Apple's new tech
articles.content:
Calling all iPhone owners Apple has announced that as of next month youll be able to use your phone (or watch) as a car key.
BMW is the first manufacturer to support the new Digital Key tech, which … [+1240 chars]
